answerText: "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow"[10]  "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow" is found in this collection, which also includes "Rip van Winkle," and was written under the pseudonym Geoffrey Crayon.
heading: ACF Fall |2008 | Brown | 21 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Name these works of Washington Irving for 10 points each. [10] After leaving a party hosted by Abraham Van Brunt, Ichabod Crane is chased by the Headless Horseman in this story.
